item.title: Streum On Studio splits from Focus Entertainment, teases new title to be announced this summer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/streum-on-studio-splits-from-focus-entertainment-teases-new-title-to-be-announced-this-summer

All hell is about to break loose.

Streum On Studio has split from Focus Entertainment following the latter’s acquisition of the former in April 2021, the companies announced. As an independent developer once again, Streum On Studio is working on a new project that it plans to announce later this summer.

The French studio has previously developed E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy, Space Hulk: Deathwing, and Necromunda: Hired Gun.

While details about the new title are to be announced, the “unannounced project” section on Streum On Studio’s official website calls it an “immersive action game.”

Streum On Studio also released a one-minute teaser trailer for the unannounced title.
